entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
